about.title: About
about.subtitle: Passionate about code, design and innovation
about.intro: Fullstack developer and Junior CTO trained at HackerU, passionate about creating modern interfaces and memorable user experiences.

excellence.title: Technical Excellence
excellence.description: Clean, typed, and tested code. TypeScript, best practices, and solid architecture are my fundamentals.

passion.title: Creative Passion
passion.description: Fluid animations, modern interfaces, and memorable user experiences. Design is at the heart of my code.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: From HackerU to self-learning, I stay curious and up-to-date with the latest technologies: React, Next.js, AI.

vision.title: CTO Vision
vision.description: Thinking architecture, scalability, and team. Transforming ideas into products that make a difference.

bio.title: Who am I?
bio.p1: I am Shay Acoca, fullstack developer, UX/UI designer, and Junior CTO. Originally from France, I discovered my passion for code in 2022 and decided to make a professional transition. My intensive training at HackerU allowed me to master modern technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and much more.
bio.p2: My passion goes beyond code. I am fascinated by user experience, fluid animations, and technological innovation. Every project is an opportunity to push boundaries, explore new interactions, and create interfaces that leave a lasting impression.
bio.p3: My current ambitions: deepening my skills in Artificial Intelligence (OpenAI API, LangChain, RAG), mastering DevOps tools (Docker, CI/CD, Kubernetes), and developing my leadership in technical collaboration to support product teams.
bio.p4: My vision of the CTO role: being the bridge between business vision and technical excellence. Building scalable architectures, training passionate teams, and delivering products that make a difference. Clean code, accessibility, and user experience are the pillars of my philosophy.

1.title: Junior CTO & Tech Specialization
1.description: Designing the CTO Portfolio, specializing in React/Next.js/AI, and developing strategic product vision.

achievements.0: Next.js 14 App Router & Server Components Architecture
achievements.1: AI Integration (OpenAI, LangChain) in real-world applications
achievements.2: Focus on performance (Core Web Vitals) and SEO
achievements.3: Active technology watch: RAG, AI Agents, Edge Computing

2.title: Open Source Project Creation
2.description: Development and maintenance of UI libraries and components (OpticGlass, CardPro, FuturistCards).

achievements.0: OpticGlass: High-performance magnifier effect with complex event handling
achievements.2: FuturistCards: Advanced UI Design and 3D CSS animations

3.title: Fullstack Developer Training
3.description: Intensive and structured training at HackerU: from 'vanilla' code to modern frameworks.

4.title: Career Transition
4.description: Discovering programming and deciding to switch careers to web development.

achievements.0: Discovering code via freeCodeCamp and online resources
achievements.1: First projects: static sites, landing pages, JavaScript mini-games
achievements.2: Decision to join HackerU for intensive training

food-recipe-app.title: Food — Recipe Application
food-recipe-app.description: Recipe management application with responsive display and category sorting.
food-recipe-app.longDescription: Complete web application for managing, organizing, and searching culinary recipes. Intuitive interface with category filtering system and responsive design adapted to all screens.

challenges.1: Creating a complete CRUD without a framework

food-recipe-app.impact: A fluid and intuitive user experience for managing daily meals.

optic-glass.title: OpticGlass — Eyewear E-commerce
optic-glass.description: Interactive e-commerce site for eyewear with dynamic magnifier effect.
optic-glass.longDescription: Immersive e-commerce experience offering detailed product visualization thanks to a custom-developed interactive magnifier effect. Cart and product catalog management.

challenges.1: Developing the magnifier effect without third-party libraries

solutions.1: Using Canvas API for image processing

futuristcards.title: FuturistCards — Digital Business Cards
futuristcards.description: Digital business card generator with 3D animations and futuristic style.
futuristcards.longDescription: Platform for creating interactive digital business cards. Uses advanced 3D CSS animations and glass effects (Glassmorphism) for a modern and impactful look.
futuristcards.impact: A modern solution for professional networking.

cardpro-ui-library.title: CardPro — Card UI Library
cardpro-ui-library.description: Library of modular UI components specialized in cards.
cardpro-ui-library.longDescription: Open-source library of highly customizable and accessible card components. Designed to accelerate the development of consistent React interfaces.
cardpro-ui-library.impact: Accelerates UI development with reliable building blocks.

portfolio-cto.title: CTO Portfolio
portfolio-cto.description: Modern portfolio with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Framer Motion and multilingual system.
portfolio-cto.longDescription: The showcase of my technical and creative know-how. This site is a concrete demonstration of Next.js App Router architecture, advanced SEO optimization, and integration of complex animations without compromising performance.

challenges.1: App Router architecture and Server Components
challenges.2: SEO optimization and Core Web Vitals

portfolio-cto.impact: A high-performance technological showcase demonstrating my CTO expertise.

design-system-kit.title: Design System — React UI Kit
design-system-kit.description: Accessible React component library with complete documentation.
design-system-kit.longDescription: A complete ecosystem of React components documented via Storybook. This project defines the visual and interactive foundations for building consistent, maintainable, and scalable applications.

solutions.1: Using Radix UI for the base

design-system-kit.impact: Accelerates new project development with a solid UI base.

stack.title: My Stack
stack.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use daily

intro.title: My approach: efficiency and scalability
intro.p1: I prioritize a modern and proven stack that allows for rapid delivery while ensuring long-term maintainability. My choice leans towards strongly typed and component-oriented technologies.
intro.p2: Next.js and TypeScript form the backbone of my projects for their performance and robustness. I combine them with a modular product approach to create rich and fluid user experiences.
